title: Product Security Review Methodology for Traeger Grill Hack
summary: Read for an in-depth analysis of the Traeger Grill hack, uncovering the vulnerabilities that could compromise your grill's security and how they were addressed.

title: A hacking hat-trick: previewing three PortSwigger Research publications coming to DEF CON & Black Hat USA
summary: We're delighted to announce three major research releases from PortSwigger Research will be published at both Black Hat USA and DEF CON 32.
